attributes.action: Calling for a by-election in Westmoreland & Lonsdale.
attributes.background:
Mr. Tim Farron MP is failing to represent the people of his constituency by ignoring the results of the UK referendum. 
He should have already called a by-election to renew his mandate but it is clear that he doesn't have a shred of honour.

rejection.details: A decision to resign would be a matter for an individual MP, not the Government or Parliament as a whole.
